Class UsersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.bioinformatics.irida.ria.web.users.UsersController

@RequestMapping("/users")
public class UsersController
extends Object
    Controller for all User related views

    • Method Detail

      • getUsersPage

        @RequestMapping
@PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\', \'ROLE_MANAGER\')")
public String getUsersPage()
        Request for the page to display a list of all projects available to the currently logged in user.
        Returns:
        The name of the page.

      • getUserSpecificPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/{userId}",
                method=GET)
public String getUserSpecificPage​(@PathVariable("userId")
                                  Long userId,
                                  @RequestParam(value="mailFailure",required=false,defaultValue="false")
                                  Boolean mailFailure,
                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                  Principal principal)
        Request for a specific user details page.
        Parameters:
        userId - The id for the user to show details for.
        model - Spring model to populate the html page
        principal - the currently logged in user
        mailFailure - if sending a user activation e-mail passed or failed
        Returns:
        The name of the user/details page

      • getLoggedInUserPage

        @RequestMapping("/current")
public String getLoggedInUserPage​(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                  Principal principal)
        Get the currently logged in user's page
        Parameters:
        model - The model to pass on
        principal - The currently logged in user
        Returns:
        getUserSpecificPage for the currently logged in user

      • updateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/{userId}/edit",
                method=POST)
public String updateUser​(@PathVariable
                         Long userId,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String firstName,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String lastName,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String email,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String phoneNumber,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String systemRole,
                         @RequestParam(required=false,name="locale")
                         String userLocale,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String password,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String enabled,
                         @RequestParam(required=false)
                         String confirmPassword,
                         org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                         Principal principal,
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Submit a user edit
        Parameters:
        userId - The id of the user to edit (required)
        firstName - The firstname to update
        lastName - the lastname to update
        email - the email to update
        phoneNumber - the phone number to update
        systemRole - the role to update
        userLocale - The locale the user selected
        password - the password to update
        confirmPassword - password confirmation
        model - The model to work on
        enabled - whether the user account should be enabled or disabled.
        principal - a reference to the logged in user.
        request - the request
        Returns:
        The name of the user view

      • getEditUserPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/{userId}/edit",
                method=GET)
@PreAuthorize("hasPermission(#userId, \'canUpdateUser\')")
public String getEditUserPage​(@PathVariable
                              Long userId,
                              org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Get the user edit page
        Parameters:
        userId - The ID of the user to get
        model - The model for the returned view
        Returns:
        The user edit view

@PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_MANAGER\')")

      • submitCreateUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/create",
                method=POST)
@PreAuthorize("hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_ADMIN\',\'ROLE_MANAGER\')")
public String submitCreateUser​(@ModelAttribute
                               User user,
                               @RequestParam
                               String systemRole,
                               @RequestParam
                               String confirmPassword,
                               @RequestParam(required=false)
                               String requireActivation,
                               org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                               Principal principal,
                               Locale locale)
        Create a new user object
        Parameters:
        user - User to create as a motel attribute
        systemRole - The system role to give to the user
        confirmPassword - Password confirmation
        requireActivation - Checkbox whether the user account needs to be activated
        model - Model for the view
        principal - The user creating the object
        locale - The logged in user's request locale
        Returns:
        A redirect to the user details view

      • usernameExists

        @RequestMapping(value="/validate-username",
                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public Boolean usernameExists​(@RequestParam
                              String username)
        Check that username not already taken
        Parameters:
        username - Username to check existence of
        Returns:
        true if username not taken

                method=GET)
@ResponseBody
public Boolean emailExists​(@RequestParam
                           String email)
        Check that email not already taken
        Parameters:
        email - Email address to check existence of
        Returns:
